quiz.question: Finish the famous movie quote: "I'm going to make him an ____ he can't refuse." (The Godfather).
Finish the quote: "Nobody puts Baby in a ____" (Dirty Dancing).
Finish the quote: "You're gonna need a bigger boat" — which composer scored the film?
Finish the famous movie quote: "May the ____ be with you." (Star Wars).
Finish the quote: "I'll be back" is an example of what cinematic device?
Finish the quote: "I see dead people." — who wrote the screenplay for The Sixth Sense?
Finish the famous movie quote: "Toto, I've a feeling we're not in ____ anymore." (The Wizard of Oz).
Finish the quote: "I love the smell of napalm in the ____." (Apocalypse Now).
Finish the quote: "Show me the money!" — which actor improvised the chant?
Finish the famous movie quote: "I'll have what she's ____." (When Harry Met Sally).
Finish the quote: "I'll have what she's having" references what comedic element?
Finish the quote: "After all, tomorrow is another day" — who wrote the novel containing this line?
Finish the famous movie quote: "I'm the king of the ____!" (Titanic).
Finish the quote: "Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer." Which film popularized this phrasing?
Finish the quote: "You talking to me?" — which unfilmed antagonist inspired De Niro's monologue?
